name: LBMRadio
0:
”Alexa, open radio l. b. m.”
”Alexa, start radio l. b. m.”
”Alexa, ask radio l. b. m. what's playing”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: radio l. b. m.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Radio LBM is an independent Web Radio based in Hong Kong created by Music lovers for Music Lovers. It stands for "La Boite a Musique" in French or "Music Box" in English. Music is our passion and has no Genre boundary. Our desire is to broadcast an Eclectic selection of Music discovered all around the World, we encourage Exploration and ask auditors to open their mind to the Music, no matter where it comes from.

Because our team is split between Hong Kong and France and because we love to explore the World, we will also share our Travel experiences through this radio and hope to give people ideas on how to go off-track when it comes to travelling in Asia. We will be sharing those Lifestyle adventures around the music and people we crossed during that journey living in Asia.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
